DataElement.preferredName: Most Recent Surgical Procedure Mammoplasty Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Latest or most recent date of surgical mammoplasty to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy, as a treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Most Recent Surgical Procedure Mammoplasty Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Nearest to the present._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Nearest to the present.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy.:Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
